title: Must Watch: Grizzly Munroâ€™s mission to climb (and descend) all 282 Munros in Scotland
content:
What on earth is a Munro? Well, it’s the name for any mountain in Scotland that is over 3,000 ft (914.4m). Thanks to Scotland’s incredible open access laws, Sean Green aka Grizzly Munro, or anyone for that matter, is able to ride all 282 of them. And that is exactly what he has set out […]

The post Must Watch: Grizzly Munro’s mission to climb (and descend) all 282 Munros in Scotland appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
